abilities.name: Surgical Precision
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the **[LETHAL HITS]** ability.

abilities.name: Vivispectrum
abilities.rule: If this model’s unit destroys an enemy unit as the result of a melee attack, until the end of the battle, this model has an Objective Control characteristic of 9.
